item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:01:44 UTC – Details)



Waterproof & Moisture: Soft PVC envelope enclosure with waterproof, clean pad with damp cloth, soft removable cover is machine washable.Do not immerse in water.
Fireproof and flame retardant pet heating pad: this product has been tested and it have the highest grade V-0 flame retardant capability.as tested in the video: burning directly with a lighter for 20 seconds will not burn.
Safety design: 59Inches/150cm Power Cord With 59Inches/150cm Chew Resistant Casing to keep safeguard you pet safe and extend the service your heating pad life.
Best suitable for dogs and cats- Help the pet (dogs, cats, rabbit, etc.) to keep healthy and comfortably in the winter. Also best for senior pets, arthritic pets, newborn pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) „ÄêRemove Odor„Äë: Guinea pig disposable cage liner contains activated carbon, which can effectively remove and neutralize the smell of urine. When the pet during toilet training, say goodbye to the unpleasant odor! Keep your home clean air.„ÄêStrong Absorption„Äë: The water-absorbent layer in bunny cage liner can accelerate the liquid to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.98 - $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:12 UTC – Details)



„ÄêRemove Odor„Äë: Guinea pig disposable cage liner contains activated carbon, which can effectively remove and neutralize the smell of urine. When the pet during toilet training, say goodbye to the unpleasant odor! Keep your home clean air.
„ÄêStrong Absorption„Äë: The water-absorbent layer in bunny cage liner can accelerate the liquid to pass through the surface, and the liquid will be in contact with it to form a gel, which instantly locks moisture and keeps the surface dry and comfortable. Let pets develop a habit of loving cleanliness.
„ÄêAnti-Leakage„Äë: The PE film layer at the bottom of the training pads is widened around to prevent the pet’s urine from leaking out, prevent soiling the floor and your furniture. It can be used not only indoors but also outdoors (used when traveling or playing leisurely on the lawn).
„ÄêTraining Pad Size„Äë: 100 count bunny pee pads size is 13″ x 18″ (33 x 45cm), replace the pad at a time, bid farewell to tedious cleaning work. Suitable for rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, puppies, dogs, cats and other small pets.

4
Price: $23.98 - $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:12 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {

return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

Product Description

You can choose from a variety of colors

There are so many colors, and you can choose one which you like best.

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, these are also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

This soft seat belt shoulder pad will provide you the most convenient driving experience ever. This is made of high quality , soft and smooth, comfortable feel, It’s not easy to fade, and healthy.

Color: As the picture show

Package included: 2 Pcs Car Seatbelt Shoulder Pad

With the high quality material, the seatbelt pads covers are very soft and warm; making it has the right amount of padding without being too bulky. This adds comfort and makes your driving more relaxing.

It is the best gift for your relatives and friends.

Gives Comfort and Helps Relieve Friction

Soft material

The car seat belt shoulder pads are made of soft materials.

Soft and Comfortable

The high quality seat belt pads are super soft and fit great to the seatbelt, provide lots of comfort.

Easy to Apply with Strong Cloth Sticker

Our shoulder pads are very easy to apply by just a cloth sticker along the length, the sticker is very strong and fits together very snugly and does not snag your clothes, easy stick on and off.

Seat Belt Pads Stay in Place

Velcro holds them in place, they don’t slide down, doesn’t move up & down while you are driving.

Multi-Purpose

The Soft Seat Belt Shoulder Pads are not just simple and fashion trend but also fully functional and practical in many purposes.

These are not just intend to your car seatbelt, also applicable in your sling bag, pack bag, guitar bag sling, golf bag sling, arm chairs and the likes.

Package Content: 2x 1 Pair seat belt shoulder pads
These Shoulder Seatbelt Cushions are great for protecting you while you drive.
It easily installs on all shoulder seatbelts, Each seat belt cover has a piece of durable special cloth sticker on the underside that you simply open, fold over the seat belt and then close again.
This Seat belt pad can be used for car, trunk, jeep, SUV, airplane, can also be used on your handbag, baby diaper bag, golf bag, luggage which has a strap, and anyplace else you want padded comfort.
This gives relaxation with its soft and comfortable feel; this makes your driving experience more at ease. This also encourages the kids to wear their seatbelts.


You can choose from a variety of colors

IMMCUTE pet training pads are ideal for puppies and dogs that stay indoors for long periods of time.All-day ProtectionIt can provide all-day protection for the puppy or senior dog potty training, making your cleanup a breeze and saving you much time.Made of High-quality Materials

And the absorbent polymer layer instantly turns liquid into a gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.Multiple UsesThe puppy pads usually placed in pet crates or kennels, pet pad holders, paper boxes, or put under the dog bowl or on the car backseat to keep clean.Not Only for Dogs, But Also for Other PetsOur pee pads/potty pads are oriented to a wide range of animals, not just for dogs but also for other pets, like kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, squirrels, etc.Note:

House training your pet can be simple when utilizing the benefits of the Indoor, Artificial Grass Puppy Pad by PETMAKER. This fake grass bathroom mat and tray is designed to accommodate the potty training needs of puppies, along with the needs of small to medium sized pets that are unable to make it outside for any reason. The portable pet pad and tray system allows your cat or dog to have an acceptable place to relieve themselves, which ensures a cleaner house, apartment, or patio. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of PETMAKER and ONLY Indoor. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. PETMAKER is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
DOG GRASS PAD WITH TRAY – This artificial turf dog pee pad provides a sanitary place for your pet to relieve themselves inside or on your balcony or patio. It‚Äôs a reusable alternative to disposable dog training pads for small to medium-sized pets.
EASY PUPPY TRAINING – Potty training your new best friend just got easier, even if you live in an apartment or work long hours. This dog grass pad helps avoid accidents while enforcing your pup‚Äôs training that they should go potty on grass.
THREE-LAYER SYSTEM – The artificial dog grass mat sits on top of a secure plastic drainage insert that allows liquid to empty into the durable collection puppy pad holder to avoid messes and spills.
EASY CLEAN-UP – Cleaning this reusable grass pad for dogs is quick and easy. Rinse the three layers of the dog potty tray with soapy water and clean-up is complete.
PRODUCT DETAILS – Materials: Synthetic Plastic (Grass Mat) and Hard Plastic (Tray and Insert). Dimensions: (L) 25‚Äù x (W) 20‚Äù x (H) 1.25‚Äù. Color: Green and Black.

Read more

3-Piece System

Synthetic Plastic Grass Mat

Grass mat looks and feels just like real grass while being completely safe and non-toxic for your pet.

Detachable Grid Tray

Holes from the detachable grid tray allows liquid to drain to the bottom base tray, so grass mat is always dry and ready for use.

Bottom Base Tray

Bottom base tray detaches from grid tray for an easy and mess free clean up. Simply rinse and wash with soap and water.

Set Include:

  • Grass Mat
  • Grid Tray
  • Base Tray
  • Dimensions: 20 x 25 x 1.25 inches
  • Indoor and Outdoor Use

Read more

Place potty trainer tray in any room in the house!

Great for apartments or homes with no available yards.

Perfect for any patio, porch, or garage!

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180¬∞swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180¬∞swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won‚Äôt scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won‚Äôt rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ‚óèInterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ‚óèExterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ‚óèFog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ‚óèStubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ‚óèNo chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads
